about_the_game:
The demo offers only part of the full-game content. We believe gameplay speaks the loudest. Download the demo and have a glimpse at what ProtoCorgi has to offer

You play as Bullet a C³ class (Cute Cyber Corgi) cybernetic pup in his quest to save his owner, a brilliant scientist kidnapped by an alien race seeking galaxy domination.
Test your skills in this action packed shoot'em up retro style pixel art or simply come enjoy the cuteness of Bullet the Corgi. ProtoCorgi offers smooth controls, exciting mechanics and with a wide varitey of gameplay for a guaranteed fun.

We aim to converge the best of the classics and newest of the shoot'em up genre into one solid piece.
Be prepared to dodge, shoot and bark in this super cute action shoot'em up!

Highlights and Features:

  • Beautiful fully animated pixel art
  • Smooth controls and solid gameplay
  • Five Stages, each with uniques bosses and themes
  • Huge variety of attacks to find what best suits your skills
  • Adjustable difficulty for everyone to have his fun

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: 2+ GHZ
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader model 3.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Stereo sound
  • Additional Notes: Some laptops will default to running ProtoCorgi off of their integrated GPU. We strongly recommend that you run ProtoCorgi on your dedicated GPU.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Macos
  • Processor: 2+ GHZ
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader model 3.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Stereo sound
  • Additional Notes: Some laptops will default to running ProtoCorgi off of their integrated GPU. We strongly recommend that you run ProtoCorgi on your dedicated GPU.

name: ProtoCorgi Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7,8,10
  • Processor: 2+ GHZ
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader model 3.0
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Stereo sound
  • Additional Notes: Some laptops will default to running ProtoCorgi off of their integrated GPU. We strongly recommend that you run ProtoCorgi on your dedicated GPU.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: You play as Bullet a C³ class (Cute Cyber Corgi) cybernetic pup in his quest to save his owner, a brilliant scientist kidnapped by an alien race seeking galaxy domination. Test your skills in this action packed shoot'em up retro style pixel art or simply come enjoy the cuteness of Bullet the Corgi.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
